statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE has_mfa = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6) OR email LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM user_access;
SELECT user_id, username, enabled FROM user_access WHERE enabled = TRUE;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM user_access JOIN user_roles ON user_access.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT role_name, permission FROM user_roles JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE enabled = TRUE;
SELECT username, password FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_access INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_access.user_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT user_access.username, user_roles.role_name, role_permissions.permission FROM user_access JOIN user_roles ON user_access.user_id = user_roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id;

SELECT user_access.user_id, user_access.username, user_roles.role_name, role_permissions.permission FROM user_access LEFT JOIN user_roles ON user_access.user_id = user_roles.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_rights WHERE access_id = '54321';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users, roles, user_roles WHERE users.user_id = user_roles.user_id AND roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT access_id, user_id, permissions FROM access_rights WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT username, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01';
